PuzzleGame.Spirit

类 Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • PuzzleGame.Spirit.Piece
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    直接已知子类:
    Piece1, Piece2, Piece3

    public abstract class Piece
extends javafx.scene.Parent
    Piece block frame in a map in this Puzzle Game. Piece block frame in a map in this Puzzle Game.
    作者:
    Group 10- Heather Xiong - 20722114 24/5/2022
    Function:
    This class is the parent class for all the pieces appearing in the game, players can move them to the right places in map using mouse, rotate them to some angle. There are three kinds of pieces in total.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setNameURL

        public void setNameURL(int type,
                       int angle)
        since every piece has several different figures due to angle and type we classified them as followed nameURL.
        参数:
        type - int (the type of piece)
        angle - int (the angle the piece has rotated)

      • setPi

        public void setPi()
        pi is the exact coordinate for different piece under different nameURL

      • setRotate

        public void setRotate(int angle,
                      javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView)
        every time we rotate a piece, we will call this function.
        参数:
        angle - int
        imageView - ImageView

      • rotate

        public void rotate()
        rotate a piece, change the angle and rotate time.
